thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 2 of 78
thread.title: Izzy
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Izzy

author: Izzy
title: Izzy
text: The product itself is great. The fellow installing, even with 30, years experience, had a hard time with installation. It would be to Pelicans advantage to have overviews to installers with new knowledge, or actually have their own installers to install NEW products. I give my installer lots of credit, he.plowed thru and finally did it. Thanks
